SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class SimplifiedPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.SimplifiedPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SimplifiedPlayer extends Object implements Serializable
A simplified description of the player. This object contains all the information needed to save the state of a player on the disk.
A simplifiedPlayer instance contains a name, a shelf, an object summarizing the achievements and the id of a personalGoalCard.
Author:
Luca Guffanti
